leather_chest.name: Leather Jacket
leather_chest.description: A large, thick leather jacket. Will provide some protection against minor injuries.

leather_cap.name: Leather Cappy
leather_cap.description: A fur-lined Cappy made from tanned leather. Keeps your head warm in the winter, boiling in the summer.

leather_pants.name: Leather Pants
leather_pants.description: A nice, adorned pair of leather pants. Somehow, they make you feel bavarian...

leather_gloves.name: fingerless leather gloves
leather_gloves.description: These thin leather gloves are missing their fingertips, encumbering you less when doing tasks.

leather_boots.name: Leather Boots
leather_boots.description: A worn-out pair of leather boots. Even though they never touched your feet before, they fit you perfectly.
